members.name: EndOfLineStringProperty
members.comment: When reading a document if a CRLF is encountered a property with this name is added and the value will be "\r\n".

members.name: insertContentAction
members.comment: Name of the action to place content into the associated document. If there is a selection, it is removed before the new content is added.

members.name: insertBreakAction
members.comment: Name of the action to place a line/paragraph break into the document. If there is a selection, it is removed before the break is added.

members.name: insertTabAction
members.comment: Name of the action to place a tab character into the document. If there is a selection, it is removed before the tab is added.

members.name: deletePrevCharAction
members.comment: Name of the action to delete the character of content that precedes the current caret position.

members.name: deleteNextCharAction
members.comment: Name of the action to delete the character of content that follows the current caret position.

members.name: deleteNextWordAction
members.comment: Name of the action to delete the word that follows the beginning of the selection.

members.name: deletePrevWordAction
members.comment: Name of the action to delete the word that precedes the beginning of the selection.

members.name: readOnlyAction
members.comment: Name of the action to set the editor into read-only mode.

members.name: writableAction
members.comment: Name of the action to set the editor into writeable mode.

members.name: cutAction
members.comment: Name of the action to cut the selected region and place the contents into the system clipboard.

members.name: copyAction
members.comment: Name of the action to copy the selected region and place the contents into the system clipboard.

members.name: pasteAction
members.comment: Name of the action to paste the contents of the system clipboard into the selected region, or before the caret if nothing is selected.

members.name: beepAction
members.comment: Name of the action to create a beep.

members.name: pageUpAction
members.comment: Name of the action to page up vertically.

members.name: pageDownAction
members.comment: Name of the action to page down vertically.

members.name: forwardAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret logically forward one position.

members.name: backwardAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret logically backward one position.

members.name: selectionForwardAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for extending the selection by moving the caret logically forward one position.

members.name: selectionBackwardAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for extending the selection by moving the caret logically backward one position.

members.name: upAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret logically upward one position.

members.name: downAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret logically downward one position.

members.name: selectionUpAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret logically upward one position, extending the selection.

members.name: selectionDownAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret logically downward one position, extending the selection.

members.name: beginWordAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the beginning of a word.

members.name: endWordAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the end of a word.

members.name: selectionBeginWordAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the beginning of a word, extending the selection.

members.name: selectionEndWordAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the end of a word, extending the selection.

members.name: previousWordAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the beginning of the previous word.

members.name: nextWordAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the beginning of the next word.

members.name: selectionPreviousWordAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the selection to the beginning of the previous word, extending the selection.

members.name: selectionNextWordAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the selection to the beginning of the next word, extending the selection.

members.name: beginLineAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the beginning of a line.

members.name: endLineAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the end of a line.

members.name: selectionBeginLineAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the beginning of a line, extending the selection.

members.name: selectionEndLineAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the end of a line, extending the selection.

members.name: beginParagraphAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the beginning of a paragraph.

members.name: endParagraphAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the end of a paragraph.

members.name: selectionBeginParagraphAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the beginning of a paragraph, extending the selection.

members.name: selectionEndParagraphAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the end of a paragraph, extending the selection.

members.name: beginAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the beginning of the document.

members.name: endAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the end of the document.

members.name: selectionBeginAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the beginning of the document.

members.name: selectionEndAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for moving the caret to the end of the document.

members.name: selectWordAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for selecting a word around the caret.

members.name: selectLineAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for selecting a line around the caret.

members.name: selectParagraphAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for selecting a paragraph around the caret.

members.name: selectAllAction
members.comment: Name of the Action for selecting the entire document

members.name: defaultKeyTypedAction
members.comment: Name of the action that is executed by default if a key typed event is received and there is no keymap entry.

members.name: getContentType
members.comment: Gets the MIME type of the data that this kit represents support for. The default is text/plain.

members.name: getViewFactory
members.comment: Fetches a factory that is suitable for producing views of any models that are produced by this kit. The default is to have the UI produce the factory, so this method has no implementation.

members.name: getActions
members.comment: Fetches the set of commands that can be used on a text component that is using a model and view produced by this kit.

members.name: createCaret
members.comment: Fetches a caret that can navigate through views produced by the associated ViewFactory.

members.name: createDefaultDocument
members.comment: Creates an uninitialized text storage model (PlainDocument) that is appropriate for this type of editor.

members.name: read
members.comment: Inserts content from the given stream which is expected to be in a format appropriate for this kind of content handler.

param: pos - The location in the document to place the content >=0.
throws: IOException - on any I/O error
BadLocationException - if pos represents an invalid location within the document.

members.name: write
members.comment: Writes content from a document to the given stream in a format appropriate for this kind of content handler.

param: pos - The location in the document to fetch the content >=0.
throws: IOException - on any I/O error
BadLocationException - if pos represents an invalid location within the document.

members.name: read
members.comment: Inserts content from the given stream, which will be treated as plain text.

param: pos - The location in the document to place the content >=0.
throws: IOException - on any I/O error
BadLocationException - if pos represents an invalid location within the document.

members.name: write
members.comment: Writes content from a document to the given stream as plain text.

param: pos - The location in the document to fetch the content from >=0.
throws: IOException - on any I/O error
BadLocationException - if pos is not within 0 and the length of the document.

members.comment: default constructor for DefaultEditorKit

name: javax.swing.text.DefaultEditorKit
comment:
This is the set of things needed by a text component to be a reasonably functioning editor for some type of text document. This implementation provides a default implementation which treats text as plain text and provides a minimal set of actions for a simple editor.
Newlines
There are two properties which deal with newlines. The system property, line.separator, is defined to be platform-dependent, either "\n", "\r", or "\r\n". There is also a property defined in DefaultEditorKit, called EndOfLineStringProperty, which is defined automatically when a document is loaded, to be the first occurrence of any of the newline characters. When a document is loaded, EndOfLineStringProperty is set appropriately, and when the document is written back out, the EndOfLineStringProperty is used. But while the document is in memory, the "\n" character is used to define a newline, regardless of how the newline is defined when the document is on disk. Therefore, for searching purposes, "\n" should always be used. When a new document is created, and the EndOfLineStringProperty has not been defined, it will use the System property when writing out the document.

Note that EndOfLineStringProperty is set on the Document using the get/putProperty methods. Subclasses may override this behavior.
